page.title: 08LIFE STYLES
page.content:
2 before dinner and 2 in the afternoon. After school the bus picks us up. When I get home I get changed, have tea and after tea I do my homework.
A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A BOARDING SCHOOL BOY (Ben Bonney-James) Matron wakes us at 7.15, we get out of bed, go down for a wash, make our beds and get dressed. At 7.50 we have house assembly and breakfast is at 8. School starts at 8.45. Mid morning break is 15 minutes long and lunch break lasts 1\ hours. After school we return to the boarding house where we can watch television or play billiards, table tennis or games outside. After tea we have prep. for 1 hour. At 7.30 we get washed and at 8.15 we read in the dorms. Lights out is at 8.45.
